title: Pixel 2 unable to boot, it only displays the charging icon even when unplugged
content:
I tried loading up a few web pages then immediately exited Chrome; the phone then flashed some glitchy lines and turned off and wont boot up, holding power only displays the charging icon even when unlocked, prompts a short vibration, then another glitchy line as the charging icon fades and back to black.

phone's running Ndroid 10 with the latest security update.
